entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -36.0°C
entry.summary:

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 31. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
